TEXT.S: Elton Brand nalecuhan i Cortlandt Manor, New York, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. Elton Brand i 1999 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 1 ku uwac atu silsil 1, namapili' tu nu Chicago Bulls putiput. 3 bulad 11 demiad, 1979 a mihca, Elton Brand, miunduay.
